name: istanbul-combine
description: easily merge coverage data from multiple istanbul runs

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && npm run test-a && npm run test-b && node ./fixture/combine.js
scripts.test-a: FIXTURE_BRANCH=a istanbul cover --print none --report json --dir coverage/a _mocha
scripts.test-b: FIXTURE_BRANCH=b istanbul cover --print none --report json --dir coverage/b _mocha

author: James Talmage <james@talmage.io>
